price: (Mose) kaa sε ”(Farao) wonim yie sε, obiara ntumi nsiane saa nsεnkyerεnee woinom, gyesε ͻsoro ne asaase Wura Nyankopͻn no, sεdeε εbεyε nyinasoɔ pefee; na Farao, menso medwen sε wasopa “.
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتَ مَآ أَنزَلَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ بَصَآئِرَ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّكَ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ مَثۡبُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad ʿalim'ta mā anzala hāulāi illā rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi baṣāira wa-innī la-aẓunnuka yāfir'ʿawnu mathbūran
